reviewText: If you are a homeowner and want to choose new paint colors, this DVD will get you on the road to being successful in your decision. Kelly is very professional but comes across as "your friend" on the DVD.  I found her ideas inspirational and helpful to me on what to do first, second, third, etc.  This is a DVD you won't want to miss!  I highly recommend it!

This DVD was most helpful, both in getting me motivated and in providing simple,
easy-to-follow rules and tools by which I could quickly refresh my home!
From beginners to the the most seasoned, homeowners will find this DVD to be an invaluable resource for everything from getting started to keeping up with the most recent trends in home decorating.
